titles.title: Commending the United States men's and women's curling teams on their accomplishments at the 2006 Winter Olympic Games in Torino, Italy.
Commending the United States men's and women's curling teams on their accomplishments at the 2006 Winter Olympic Games in Torino, Italy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Commends the athletes of the U.S. curling teams for their grace, sportsmanship, determination, and accomplishments at the 2006 Winter Olympics.
